message.content: {"given_definition_quality":63,"better_definition":"a short while; a little bit; once briefly","sentence":"我试一下儿。","image_prompt":"A friendly person standing in the center of a misty, softly ruined city, reaching out to gently try touching a glowing button or object in front of them. The scene is in an animation style called 'soft apocalypse', with pastel colors, soft light, faded backgrounds, and gentle clouds or debris. The mood is hopeful and light, emphasizing that the person is trying something for a short moment.","sentence_translation":"I will try (it) for a bit."}
